description: drafts a metaprocess prompt template given the task description
prompt_template:
lambda input, aux_input: f"Metaprocesses v0
types: (completions, probability)

Examples:

desc: "Predicts the author of a given text"
title: "author attribution"
type: completions
prompt:"Text: '{{input}}'\nAuthor:"

desc: "Checks if the input contains the property specified in aux_input"
title: "contains property"
type: probability
prompt: "Text: '{{input}}'\nContains {{aux_input}}? (Yes/No):"

desc: "{aux_input}"
"
